pages.text: the athame is an essential tool to any witch. it can be used to gather special drops (such as heads) from mobs, and also has a lot of niche uses.$(br2)being made out of silver, it is perfectly usable against vampires and werewolves too.
by slaying a humanoid with an athame while holding a glass bottle in the offhand, one can collect bottles of blood.$(br2)athames are also used to start most sacrificial rituals.
